BuyerAgent_main.body: 'u<CFP>.u(msg).[msg=PriceInfo](BuyerAgent_RefuseBranch(u, w, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, InfPay, Payment) + BuyerAgent_BuyBranch(u, w, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, InfPay, Payment))

BuyerAgent_RefuseBranch.body: 'u<Refuse>.BuyerAgent_main(u, w, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, InfPay, Payment)

BuyerAgent_BuyBranch.body: 'u<Buy>.w(msg1).[msg1=InfPay]'w<Payment>.u(msg2).[msg2=Deliver]BuyerAgent_main(u, w, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, InfPay, Payment)

SellerAgent_main.body: u(msg).[msg=CFP]('u<PriceInfo>.u(msg1).([msg1=Refuse]SellerAgent_RefuseBranch(u, v, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, ReqPay, PaySuc, msg1) + [msg1=Buy]SellerAgent_BuyBranch(u, v, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, ReqPay, PaySuc, msg1)))

SellerAgent_RefuseBranch.body: [msg1=Refuse]SellerAgent_main(u, v, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, ReqPay, PaySuc)

SellerAgent_BuyBranch.body: [msg1=Buy]'v<ReqPay>.v(msg2).[msg2=PaySuc]'u<Deliver>.SellerAgent_main(u, v, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, ReqPay, PaySuc)

System_main.body: (^u)(^v)(^w)(^CFP)(^PriceInfo)(^Refuse)(^Buy)(^Deliver)(^ReqPay)(^PaySuc)(^InfPay)(^Payment) (BuyerAgent_main(u, w, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, InfPay, Payment) | SellerAgent_main(u, v, CFP, PriceInfo, Refuse, Buy, Deliver, ReqPay, PaySuc) | BankAgent_main(v, w, ReqPay, PaySuc, InfPay, Payment))
